actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service and Agency Organization.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil Service and Agency Organization

official_title: Recognizing the establishment of the Rotary Club of Capitol Hill and the important contributions of Rotary Clubs to society.

summary.text: Declares that the House of Representatives: (1) commends the establishment of the Rotary Club of Capitol Hill; (2) recognizes its important contribution to society; (3) salutes its charter members and officers for their commitment to service; and (4) encourages the Club's growth and longevity.

titles.title: Recognizing the establishment of the Rotary Club of Capitol Hill and the important contributions of Rotary Clubs to society.
